temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 中医这件事 in the user temberature at 2022-06-25T14:17:45
item.description:
in reference to:

所以后来索性把医生的眼睛也蒙起来——不告诉医疗人员哪组是安慰剂组哪组是实验组，所有的结果由第三方机构去统计和评判，这就是双盲对照实验。这种测试最大限度地排除了病人的安慰剂效应和医生的主观偏好，成为了判断药物客观疗效最有力的证据，现代医学的“金标准”。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:23:28
item.description:
in reference to:

The two core features I need are spaced repetition and bi-directional linking.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:30:38
item.description:
in reference to:

With the benefit of hindsight, one glaring problem is that, what you do to increase the levels of processing (increasing comprehension and making connections) is beyond the scope of any spaced repetition systems; they’re not conducive to (deep) thinking and making connections.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated MasterHowToLearn - Why 99% People Never Learned How To Learn And How to Become That 1% (I) in the user temberature at 2022-08-08T11:44:26
item.description:
in reference to:

From now on, my focus on “how to learn” would be shifted from “when should I review this” to “what should I do when I indeed review this?” It’ll be about thinking frameworks and mental models; it’s about “what and how to think” instead of “when to think.”

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 游牧教室的文具盒：为何真正的学习是舒适的 in the user temberature at 2022-08-17T03:15:15
item.description:
in reference to:

此时的游牧教室，几乎变成了一层套一层的叠加小宇宙。最内层是学生的头脑。包裹着它的，是我们的对话（以及白板互动）。在这一层对话之外，是我的头脑（其中有无数可能突然才想起来的事例、材料，以及数字卡片资料）。而在我的物质身体之外是书库中无数的书架。

item.description:
in reference to:

With basic (BRE) syntax, these characters do not have special meaning unless prefixed (前缀) with a backslash (‘\’); While with extended (ERE) syntax it is reversed: these characters are special unless they are prefixed (前缀) with backslash (‘\’).

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 年度征文 | 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ - 少数派 in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T03:30:41
item.description:
in reference to:

对于 DEVONthink 来说，我觉得它最重要的就是 Search 搜索功能。比如说我通过 Alfred 的 DEVONthink 插件快速输入「重器轻用」，然后我就可以搜到在 DEVONthink 里面所有关于「重器轻用」的信息。而这个搜索速度是极快的，并且在右侧边栏，你可以看到搜索结果有一个展现的区域，让你快速知道哪些地方有相关文字的一个出处。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 年度征文 | 我是如何艰难地克服「效率成瘾」的？ - 少数派 in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T03:31:33
item.description:
in reference to:

其实我就能找到之前所有提到该内容的地方，而这个地方的「快」是非常重要的。我常常把 DEVONthink 比作是一栋楼当中的地下室或者是楼阁，当我们需要找什么内容的时候，我们能够非常快速地去找。虽然说平常不会去楼阁里面翻东西，但只要它搜索起来很快，你就能够快速地去找到想要的内容。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.description:

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated r/devonthink - Is DEVONthink worth it? in the user temberature at 2022-09-01T04:02:11
item.description:
in reference to:

I suppose it depends what you want to use it for. I use it for research mainly. It is excellent for document storage and analysts and it has been a game changer for me. Coupled with its ability with RSS feeds and Devon agent, I have to say it is superb. I suspect I’m only scratching the surface of its capability. It is a pretty steep learning curve but it’s capabilities are massive.Have a look at the videos on www.screencastsonline.com there is a free membership for 7 days which should give you some idea of what it is capable of. They were a great intro for me.

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:20:58
item.description:
in reference to:

每日总热量的 50%～55% 左右应由碳水化合物构成，其中大部分来自水果、蔬菜、豆类和豆科植物以及粗粮。添加糖在每日总热量中的占比应小于 10%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:25:14
item.description:
in reference to:

人体对鸡蛋中蛋白质的利用率为 100%，牛奶和肉类蛋白质利用率也同样很高。人体对大多数蔬菜和谷物中的蛋白质的利用率略低于 50%。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:27:38
item.description:
in reference to:

蛋白质通常不用于供应能量。然而，如果人体未从其他营养物质或体内贮存的脂肪中获得足够热量，则会将蛋白质分解为酮体以供应能量。如果蛋白质的消耗量比需要量多，那么人体就会分解蛋白质，然后以脂肪的形式贮存起来。

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 碳水化合物、蛋白质和脂肪 - 营养障碍 - 《默沙东诊疗手册大众版》 in the user temberature at 2022-11-02T09:36:29
item.description:
in reference to:

脂肪是供应能量最慢的物质，但却是食物中能量效率最高的。每克脂肪能够供应机体大约 9 卡路里的能量，比蛋白质或者碳水化合物的两倍还多。

in reference to:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated 编写第一个Qt程序 in the user temberature at 2022-12-12T16:37:42
item.description:
in reference to:

QMainWindow 是主窗口类，主窗口具有主菜单栏、工具栏和状态栏，类似于一般的应用程序的主窗口； QWidget 是所有具有可视界面类的基类，选择 QWidget 创建的界面对各种界面组件都可以 支持； QDialog 是对话框类，可建立一个基于对话框的界面；

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Google Colaboratory in the user temberature at 2022-12-13T12:52:23
item.description:
in reference to:

This method answers queries in two steps: first it retrieves the information relevant to the query, then it writes an answer tailored to the question based on the retrieved information. The first step uses the Embedding API, the second step uses the Completions API.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated Google Colaboratory in the user temberature at 2022-12-13T12:55:17
item.description:
in reference to:

Sections should be large enough to contain enough information to answer a question; but small enough to fit one or several into the GPT-3 prompt. We find that approximately a paragraph of text is usually a good length, but you should experiment for your particular use case.

temberature@hypothes.is said:

item.title: temberature@hypothes.is annotated About pull requests - GitHub Docs in the user temberature at 2022-12-13T15:26:09
item.description:
in reference to:

By default, in public repositories, any user can submit reviews that approve or request changes to a pull request. Organization owners and repository admins can limit who is able to give approving pull request reviews or request changes.
